tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
So I have completed my Orthodontic treatment at Embrace Orthodontist Khar with Dr Keyur Shah and Dr Shagun Mehta. 

About the treatment-

The treatment has been very satisfying, I started my treatment in Oct 2021 and have completed in June 2023 (18 months) and I required 47 aligners in total. As for the cost is affordable (although relatively more than the traditional braces that take more time).

My experience- It took me 2 days initially to get used to the wearing and removal of aligners. Every new aligner was slightly discomforting and painful (bearable pain) for 3 days after that it would be comfortable to wear. I wore the first 25 aligners for 15 days each and the remaining each for a week. I personally think that, the initial discomfort is definitely less compared to the traditional braces. And after 25 aligners I was very much used to the aligners.

My experience with Dr Keyur Shah-

He is amazing. He explained each step very well and is very gentle and patient with his work.

My experience with Dr Shagun Mehta- 
 
I had my cavity tooth fillings/restoration and wisdom tooth extraction treated by her. She too is very patient, gentle and quick with her work. [P.S It took 5 mins for her to get the wisdom tooth extracted ;) ]

My overall experience and special story- 
My wisdom tooth was decayed to the point it reached to the nerve and was very painful, and I had to get it extracted immediately. As it was Ramazan so I could get it treated later in the evening only, both Dr Keyur Shah and Dr Shagun Mehta were very considerate and accommodative to schedule the same for me post fast and were very patient though I reached super late and also allowed me sometime to eat/drink/open my fast before starting the treatment.

I highly recommend Embrace Orthodontics Khar, Dr Keyur Shah and Dr Shagun Mehta for anyone who wants to get the orthodontist treatment in lesser time, Please note that the treatment plan is subjective based on individual‚Äôs compliance and bone movement. 

Thank you Dr Keyur Shah and Dr Shagun Mehta :)
You guys are great at your worküëèüëè

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Dr Keyur is very professional and true to his words. My case was  complicated and I visited many doctors before I decided to  pursue the treatment with Dr Keyur. It‚Äôs been almost 2 years and he has always been honest about what the treatment could or could not achieve. And always on time for the appointments. 
I have taken almost 2 years before I could pen a review as I wanted to make sure that it‚Äôs helpful for others. 
You are in safe hands.
reply_text: Thank you Nitya for your words of appreciation!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Metal Braces Fixing,Braces adjustments,Straightening Teeth (Conventional Braces),
review: I had a very pleasant experience with Dr Keyur Mehta. I am in my mid-thirties and made the decision to go for teeth straightening and Dr Keyur suggested to go with Lingual Braces( Fixed on Inner surface of teeth). I am really thankful to him for this suggestion to go with that treatment. The bracing work is so perfect that none of my colleagues notice or know that I am having braces and these did align my teeths within a year. Throughout the treatment I didn't face any dental or speech problems and also he was very supportive in my very busy travel schedule. I would recommend him for your better smile üòÉ.
reply_text: We thank you for your kind words!!
